productDescription: The Silversmith Earhoops consist of a solid silver 15 mm hoop with a hammered rectangle charm. Wear these earhoops in combination with some other simple earhoops for an edgy look.

optionalInfo.production: Handmade in our Amsterdam based Atelier of recycled silver.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: We pack your order in plastic-free package material. Free shipping on all NL orders.
